com.sohu.adrd.data.pig.udf.custom

类 TestConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sohu.adrd.data.pig.udf.custom.TestConverter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.pig.LoadCaster, org.apache.pig.LoadStoreCaster, org.apache.pig.StoreCaster

    public class TestConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.pig.LoadStoreCaster
    This abstract class provides standard conversions between utf8 encoded data and pig data types. It is intended to be extended by load and store functions (such as PigStorage).
